document.full_text: a german man believed to have given information to the country's intelligence services about possible terror attacks in germany confessed in court on thursday to being a member of al qaeda, his lawyer said.
document.title: german confesses to being al qaeda member
lines_and_colors: a german man believed to have given information to the country's intelligence services about possible terror attacks in germany confessed in court on thursday to being a member of al qaeda, his lawyer said.
